description: ff. 192. 200 x 140; 150 x 100 mm. 19 lin. Muḥammad ibn Tāj al-Dīn al-Ḥusaynī al-Arīḥāwī, Jumādá I, 1089. Anon. abridgment of ʻAbd al-Qādir al-Jīlānī's Ghunyah. Incip.: ... الحمد لله ... وبعد فهذا کتاب مختصر من الغنىة فاقول ... فصل فى اداب السلام
subject: Islamic ethics—Early works to 1800
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
